text: jyare setana te'ona karyone temana mate uttama batavi rahyo hato ane kahi rahyo hato ke loko manthi ko'i pana aje tamara para vijaya prapta nathi kari sakata, hum pote pana tamari madada karanara chum, parantu jyare banne laskara sama-same avi gaya to, potani edi vade pachala hati gayo ane kaheva lagyo ke hum to tamarathi alago chum, hum te jo'i rahyo chum je tame nathi jo'i rahya, hum allahathi daru chum ane allaha ta'ala sakhata yatana apanara che
